output_list.impact: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows unauthorized increase of total supply.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows unauthorized increase of total supply.
PayWinner function relies on random logic, allowing attackers. One possible attacker could create a user-funded contract to pay himself (or his team) in exchange for promoting his product.
MorphToken function relies on random logic, allowing unauthorized access to the contract.
freezeAccount function allows unauthorized third party to freeze an arbitrary user's assets.
changeName function allows unauthorized third party to change the contract's name.
changeSymbol function allows unauthorized third party to change the contract's symbol.
changeDecimals function allows unauthorized third party to change the contract's decimal units.
